akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3146. Effect on other federal laws This subchapter does not supersede or impair any authority otherwise granted by federal law to provide for the establishment of specific wage rates. (Pub. L. 107–217, Aug. 21, 2002, 116 Stat. 1152.)
Historical and Revision Notes

314640:276a–3.Mar. 3, 1931, ch. 411, § 4, 46 Stat. 1494; Aug. 30, 1935, ch. 825, 49 Stat. 1012.
